text:
Reese Witherspoon and Oprah Winfrey appeared to have too many hands and legs in new photos from Vanity Fair.

Ah, the dangers of Photoshop.

In the newly released Hollywood issue from Vanity Fair, Oprah Winfrey has three hands in one photo and Reese Witherspoon appears to have three legs in another.

The flop lit up Twitter on Thursday and Friday.

12 extraordinary stars, one very momentous year. The 2018 Hollywood portfolio is here: https://t.co/6PfsFsPzK1 pic.twitter.com/MfRsp2y9Z3 — VANITY FAIR (@VanityFair) January 25, 2018

Unlimited Digital Access: Only $0.99 For Your First Month Get full access to The Kansas City Star content across all your devices. SAVE NOW

Oprah and Witherspoon made light of the gaffe.

Well...I guess everybody knows now...I have 3 legs. I hope you can still accept me for who I am. ( and I will never apologize for snuggling @Oprah .. if you get the opportunity, I highly recommend it;) https://t.co/6GyrfWxNSY — Reese Witherspoon (@RWitherspoon) January 25, 2018 I accept your 3d leg. As I know you accept my 3d hand❤️ — Oprah Winfrey (@Oprah) January 25, 2018

And many others chimed in about the oddity of the photos.

But it turns out, the photo of Witherspoon with three legs is an illusion, according to Vanity Fair. The lining of her dress resembles her legs, making it appear she has a third one.

While we would have loved the exclusive on @RWitherspoon's three legs, unfortunately it's just the lining of her dress. https://t.co/HJjvbc037S — VANITY FAIR (@VanityFair) January 25, 2018

As for Oprah’s mysterious third hand, Vanity Fair fessed up to the error.

"YOU get a hand! And YOU get a hand! And YOU get a hand!" pic.twitter.com/4lsl1vGW0K — Tim Marcin (@TimMarcin) January 25, 2018
title: Oprah has three hands? New Vanity Fair photo has error
